meanings.sent1: The decision to jump off the roof without a parachute was truly asinine.
meanings.sent2: It was asinine to try to fit a square peg into a round hole.
meanings.sent3: The asinine chicken thought it could outsmart the fox by wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: His asinine behavior was like watching a clown juggle watermelons.
meanings.sent5: The asinine mistake cost him the championship title.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a silly or ridiculous manner.
meanings.sent1: The asinine clown made everyone laugh with his silly antics.
meanings.sent2: She made an asinine face in the photo booth, sticking out her tongue.
meanings.sent3: The asinine puppy tried to chase its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her asinine dance moves were like a monkey on a unicycle.
meanings.sent5: The asinine prank involved filling the office with balloons.
